Past Work - Daily Audio Bible Donations

19 May 2016

I worked in one of those basement shops (startups?), and I got to do a lot of WordPress Development. I still ended up being mostly the styles and markup guy.

But still…

I did get to work with PHP a bit, since it was WordPress Development. I think my favorite acheivement there was creating a WordPress plugin in for flexible, one-time donations using the Stripe API.

We used an example from Pippin’s Plugins as guidance to create our base. The site has changed a bit and looks a lot better than when I implemented the plugin, but I think it’s here.
